content.text:
# Draft:European Capital of Democracy

[https://capitalofdemocracy.eu/ European Capital of Democracy (ECoD)] is a Europe-wide initiative launched in 2022. It is operated by the ECoD Non-Profit Organisation, based in Vienna. Every year, a jury of European citizens selects the next title-holding city to host the Democracy Programme for the upcoming year.
European Capitals of Democracy throughout the years are:
- [https://acte-europe.org/trombinoscope/4hHDRKdlr8i1Yz78AtNwtM/european-capital-of-democracy 2023/2024 - Barcelona]
- [https://www.wien.gv.at/english/politics-administration/european-capital-of-democracy.html 2024/2025 - Vienna]
- [https://www.settlers.pt/en-gb/news-detail/cascais-european-capital-of-democracy-2026-what-does-it-mean/51680 2026 - Cascais]
